metadata.name: SENTIENT SIGIL ⊹ IMAGINARY EXCESS I.
metadata.description:
⊹ This sentient sigil is a symbol imbued with consciousness and sentience, it attracts positive energy, manifests desired outcomes and brings about personal transformation.

⊹ Each sigil constitutes a Divine Compass, a potent tool for navigation and guidance through the celestial coordinates of the unfolding new Era. Together they formulate into the Constellation of Transfiguration.

⊹ The cardinal invocations calling forth TRANSFIGURATION are as follows:

IMAGINARY EXCESS ࿐  
UNBOUND COURAGE ࿐  
SURRENDER TO SINCERITY ࿐  
SUSTAINED REGENERATION ࿐ 

⊹ Each sigil is imbued with the molecules of respective elements surrounding them in the world alongside the dynamic belief necessary for their actualisation. The latter is charged through the unique seeds of the participatory network.

⊹ (2023, PNG, 2048 X 2048 px)
